examples: The actress was practicing her lines before the audition.
Her life had always run smoothly before.
We have had these mysteries before.
Have you ever used this software before?
The case was tried before a jury.
words.defineEn: ahead of someone or something in time, order, or importance
words.defineVi: trước một ai đó hoặc một cái gì đó trong thời gian, trật tự, hoặc tầm quan trọng

examples: After all, one case of the trots hardly spells disaster.
Every age has its book, after all.
After all, love will find a way.
After all, an electrical brain is smarter than the sum of its parts.
A new broom sweeps clean, after all.
words.defineEn: at a later time than something; in a position that is next in order or importance
words.defineVi: muộn hơn một cái gì đó; ở một vị trí tiếp theo theo thứ tự hoặc tầm quan trọng

examples: My father pays his bills at the beginning of the month.
My friends enjoyed tangy barbecue gammon skewers at the summer barbecue.
The professor made mincemeat of the speaker at the conference.
My friends enjoyed smoky beef rib chops at the countryside barbecue.
The lingonberry sauce perfectly complemented the roasted turkey at Thanksgiving dinner.
words.defineEn: used to show a particular place or position
words.defineVi: được sử dụng để hiển thị một địa điểm hoặc vị trí cụ thể

examples: The police closed in.
The mother gently cradled her newborn baby in her arms.
His partner left the table in a fit of pique.
In 2018 the party had 10 000 members.
The birds built their nest in the tree.
words.defineEn: at a point inside or within a space or an area
words.defineVi: tại một điểm bên trong hoặc trong một không gian hoặc một khu vực

examples: The heat was really on at work.
That hot guy had a good head on his shoulders.
The children enjoyed a refreshing slice of watermelon on a hot summer day.
On the credit side, the restaurant offers a wide range of choices.
Our company puts the emphasis on quality.
words.defineEn: used to show that an object is physically in contact with or attached to a surface or object
words.defineVi: được sử dụng để chỉ ra rằng một vật thể đang tiếp xúc hoặc gắn vào một bề mặt hoặc vật thể

examples: Just click the link below.
She had a scar just below her knee from a childhood bike accident.
They are all equally below the salt.
The cliff dropped down over a hundred feet to the sea below.
I know she really wants the promotion, but she really hit me below the belt by telling the boss about my personal problems.
words.defineEn: to or at a lower position or level than someone or something
words.defineVi: đến hoặc ở một vị trí hoặc mức độ thấp hơn so với một ai đó hoặc một cái gì đó

examples: She raised both arms above her head.
The articles in this magazine are a cut above the others.
John stands head and shoulders above Bob.
The deal was completely open and above board.
Singapore punches above its weight in the world economy.
words.defineEn: to or at a higher position or place than something or someone
words.defineVi: đến hoặc ở một vị trí hoặc địa điểm cao hơn một cái gì đó hoặc một ai đó

examples: The children skipped stones across the calm river surface.
The majestic horse galloped across the open field.
The general had to get his troops across the river.
The carpet only reached halfway across the room.
They pushed the heavy box across the room.
words.defineEn: on the opposite or other side of a thing or place
words.defineVi: ở phía đối diện hoặc phía bên kia của một điều hoặc địa điểm

examples: It was too near for comfort.
The big fellow keeps a fish shop near the post office.
Some of his jokes are a bit near the knuckle.
I hear the sound of seagulls near the sea.
My grandmother stands near the entrance to greet guests.
words.defineEn: at a short distance away from someone or something
words.defineVi: ở một khoảng cách ngắn từ một ai đó hoặc một cái gì đó

examples: Trains between London and Brighton run throughout the day.
Responsibility is shared between parents and teachers.
This collection of stories bridges the gap between history and fiction.
This book bridges a gulf between the metaphysics literature and philosophy of mind literature.
His incorrect translation of the phrase caused a misunderstanding between the two parties.
words.defineEn: in, into, or at the space that is separating two things, places, or people
words.defineVi: trong, vào hoặc tại không gian ngăn cách hai sự vật, địa điểm hoặc con người

examples: Check the box next to the right answer.
Roquefort cheese is in the cheese section, next to the blue cheeses.
We know next to nothing about our ancestors.
I have a bedside table next to my bed for my books and glasses.
I placed my bag on the empty chair next to me.
words.defineEn: in or into a position immediately to or right by one side of someone or something
words.defineVi: trong hoặc vào một vị trí ngay lập tức hoặc ngay bên cạnh một ai đó hoặc một cái gì đó

examples: Our equipment is a bit behind the times.
The meeting was held behind closed doors.
Programs are running a few minutes behind schedule this evening.
A man suddenly appeared from behind a tree.
Shoppers took cover behind cars as police marksmen returned fire.
words.defineEn: at or toward the back of something or someone, typically hidden by it or them
words.defineVi: ở hoặc về phía sau của một cái gì đó hoặc ai đó, thường bị che khuất bởi nó hoặc họ

examples: Retirement often brings with it a massive drop in income.
My friend prefers a vegetarian sandwich with avocado and sprouts.
The restaurant served their fish and chips with a side of brown sauce.
The brunch special featured a beefburger with a sunny-side-up egg, crispy bacon, and a dollop of hollandaise sauce.
My mother pickled radishes with vinegar and spices.
words.defineEn: used when two or more things or people are together in a single place
words.defineVi: được sử dụng khi hai hoặc nhiều thứ hoặc người ở cùng một nơi

examples: To turn cartwheels/somersaults.
To save a penalty.
To play the piano/violin/flute.
To call a meeting/strike.
To have a meeting/a party/a concert.
words.defineEn: used to say where someone or something goes
words.defineVi: được sử dụng để nói nơi một ai đó hoặc một cái gì đó đi

examples: Suddenly another soldier hits the dirt beside me.
I dropped another plate!
The lawyers put another nail in her coffin today.
Yet another candidate has thrown his hat into the ring.
The squirrel jumped from one tree branch to another.
words.defineEn: one more of the same kind of object or living thing
words.defineVi: thêm một đối tượng hoặc sinh vật cùng loại

examples: Maybe this photograph will jog your memory.
This book bridges a gulf between the metaphysics literature and philosophy of mind literature.
Does this pub do lunches?
This skirt has a stretchy waistband for comfort.
This room gets very little sunshine.
words.defineEn: used to refer to an object or person that is physically close to one
words.defineVi: được sử dụng để chỉ một đối tượng hoặc người gần gũi với một người

examples: That holiday cost me a small fortune.
That movie knocked my socks off.
That accident battered up the door of my car.
That shot lost him the championship.
lose that creep!
words.defineEn: used to refer to an object or person that is physically away from one
words.defineVi: được sử dụng để chỉ một đối tượng hoặc người cách xa một người

examples: Both men wore confident smiles.
Both drivers shared the blame for the accident.
Both teams chanced their arms at every opportunity.
They both pay their employees badly.
She raised both arms above her head.
words.defineEn: used to talk about two things or people
words.defineVi: được sử dụng để nói về hai điều hoặc người

examples: What's the capital of Peru?’
What are your plans for today?
What's your favorite evening activity?
What is your favorite color?
What is the capital of France?
words.defineEn: the thing or things that
words.defineVi: vật hoặc những thứ mà

examples: The universal language of art is bridging a divide.
Good wine can make a meal.
Memories of that day still bring a lump to his throat.
The brunch special featured a beefburger with a sunny-side-up egg, crispy bacon, and a dollop of hollandaise sauce.
My vegetarian friend enjoyed a nourishing adzuki bean grain bowl for lunch.
words.defineEn: used when we want to talk about a person or thing for the first time or when other people may not know who or what they are
words.defineVi: được sử dụng khi chúng ta muốn nói về một người hoặc vật lần đầu tiên hoặc khi những người khác có thể không biết họ là ai hoặc cái gì

examples: Get a load of George over there.
The incident was over in a twinkle.
Buses take priority over other vehicles on the road.
People held handkerchiefs over their mouths.
The chef drizzled cream over the warm apple pie.
words.defineEn: at a position above or higher than something
words.defineVi: ở một vị trí trên hoặc cao hơn một cái gì đó

examples: Under stress, the body produces adrenalin.
The flowers bloomed under the sunny sky.
The bag broke under the weight of the bottles inside it.
Lots of people had left comments under the post.
A reporter obtained documents from the company under false pretenses.
words.defineEn: in, to, or through a position that is below something
words.defineVi: trong, đến hoặc thông qua một vị trí bên dưới một cái gì đó
